text.text_translated: For a very long time, in all countries, people had dreams. They thought dreams could tell them about the future. People thought dreams were messages from gods. These messages gave them information. They helped people understand things. Even today, many people remember dreams. They dreamed about a thing, a place, or a person. Later, this dream happened for real.
